projects.title: Fraudulent News Detection/Classification
projects.description: This project utilizes natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning algorithms to classify news articles as real or fake. It features a user-friendly web interface built with Streamlit for effortless interaction.

projects.title: Tree Visualizer
projects.description: A dynamic visualization tool for various tree data structures, enhancing the learning experience with real-time interaction

services.title: Full Stack Development
services.description: Transforming ideas into dynamic web applications using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) and cutting-edge technologies. Focused on responsive design, intuitive user interfaces, and secure back-end services.

services.title: Cloud Solutions & DevOps
services.description: Leveraging AWS, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines for scalable and resilient cloud-based solutions. Expertise in containerization, automated workflows, and infrastructure as code (IaC) for seamless deployment.

services.title: Scalable System Design
services.description: Designing highly scalable, reliable, and efficient systems using microservices architecture, message queues (Kafka, Redis), and real-time data processing technologies like WebSockets and WebRTC.

services.title: API Development & Integration
services.description: Building secure, fast, and robust RESTful APIs, ensuring seamless integration with front-end applications and third-party services. Optimizing performance with proper architecture and caching mechanisms.

services.title: Performance Optimization & Security
services.description: Ensuring optimal performance and security of your applications through techniques such as code splitting, DDoS protection, rate limiting, and database indexing. Aiming for low-latency and high-throughput systems.

aboutpara: I'm Akshat Gandhi, a passionate Full Stack Developer with a deep love for building innovative web applications and scalable systems. Currently pursuing my B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering at Galgotias University, I specialize in JavaScript, Node.js, AWS, and modern web frameworks. I have a strong foundation in backend technologies and system design, and I love solving complex problems with elegant solutions. My goal is to create software that not only performs well but is also user-friendly and secure. I'm constantly learning new technologies and approaches to stay at the forefront of development practices.
